tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PhylogeneticData (
 species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 species_name VARCHAR(255),
 evolutionary_relationship VARCHAR(255),
 common_ancestor VARCHAR(255)
)
CREATE TABLE species (species_id INT PRIMARY KEY, species_name VARCHAR(50), kingdom VARCHAR(50), family VARCHAR(50), order_name VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE evolutionary_relationships (relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY, species_id1 INT, species_id2 INT, relationship_type VARCHAR(50))

CREATE TABLE Species (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    scientific_name VARCHAR(100),
    kingdom VARCHAR(50),
    phylum VARCHAR(50),
    class VARCHAR(50),
    order VARCHAR(50),
    family VARCHAR(50),
    genus VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE EvolutionaryRelationship (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT,
    related_species_id INT,
    relationship_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (related_species_id) REFERENCES Species(id)
)

CREATE TABLE GeneticSequence (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT,
    sequence TEXT,
    date_created DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(id)
)

CREATE TABLE PhylogeneticTree (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    root_species_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (root_species_id) REFERENCES Species(id)
)

CREATE TABLE Researcher (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    institution VARCHAR(100)
)
